Description: ID which uniquely identifies the conversation
The ID of the customer, maps to EXT_PTY_ID_TX in OCIS (to confirm)
Start time of the conversation
Curation: BigQuery datetime format is YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:SS.FFFFFF

Description: End time of the conversation
Curation: BigQuery datetime format is YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:SS.FFFFFF

Description: Time (in seconds) from when the customer started the conversation until it ended
Personal name of the customer
Curation: Change field name from 'name' to 'firstName', Moved from the 'sdes' object

Description: Surname of the customer
Curation: Moved from the 'sdes' object, PII treatment

Description: The brand of the customer, e.g. Halifax, Lloyds, Bos, MBNA
Curation: Change field name from 'companyBranch' to 'brand', Moved from the 'sdes' object, PII treatment

Description: ID of the most recent agent the conversation was assigned to
The most recent agent's nickname
The most recent agent's full name
The most recent agent's login name
Indicates whether the agent was deleted
Most recent skill ID of the conversation
Most recent skill name that the conversation was assigned to
Source origin (eg. App) from which the conversation was initially opened
Reason for closing the conversation - by agent / customer
Additional information regarding the conversation close reason
Meaningful Conversation Score of the conversation up to this message
Divides the MCS score into 3 groups: Positive, Neutral, Negative
Latest status of the conversation
Whether it is the customer's first conversation
Type of device from which the conversation was initially opened
The browser or hosted application of the engagement
Detailed version info of the user agent (browser or host-application)
Operating system of the device
The operating system version, and distribution type (if relevant)
Group ID of the agent most recently assigned to the conversation
Group name of the agent most recently assigned to the conversation
Indicates if the conversation is assigned to an agent or waiting in queue
Indicates whether the conversation's data is partial
Session ID in LivePerson system
The customer's time zone
Curation: Value is a long string with a lot of redundacy, parse the relevant information information out of this value

Description: The features that the connection is using
Language of the conversation's context
The integration type: mobile-sk, web-sdk, brand-sdk
The version of the integration
